ing: 3 tablespoons dry ranch salad dressing mix
2 tablespoons finely chopped red bell pepper
1 small jalapeno pepper, seeded and coarsely chopped
1 dash hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabascoâ„¢), or to taste
des: "This picante dressing is great on fries with cheese and bacon, with chicken fingers, burgers, or on a red leaf, cucumber and tomato salad."
ins: In a blender, combine the mayonnaise, buttermilk, ranch dressing mix, bell pepper, cilantro, jalapeno pepper and hot pepper sauce. Pulse until blended.
